text: The Executioner is a 1970 British spy thriller movie directed by Sam Wanamaker and starring George Peppard, Joan Collins, Judy Geeson, Charles Gray, Nigel Patrick, Keith Michell. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1970 thriller movies Category:1970s spy movies Category:British spy movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Sam Wanamaker Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Executioner (1970 movie)
